product_name: Nike Zoom Force 1 Boa Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Nike Zoom Force 1 Boa women's snowboard boots outfit your feet for conquering the steeps, and feature dual-zone Boa closures so you can get a fast, dialed-in fit for all-day comfort.
short_description: Nike Zoom Force 1 Boa women's snowboard boots outfit your feet for conquering the steeps, and feature dual-zone Boa closures so you can get a fast, dialed-in fit for all-day comfort.
